title: How Did the Ben Simmons Situation Go So Wrong? | The Answer
description:
Chris and Seerat discuss the Ben Simmons saga and how it’s gotten to the point where Simmons reportedly does not intend on showing up to Sixers training camp (0:55). They wrap up by discussing 'Succession'.

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Seerat Sohi
Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely
